sentences.english: Water Proof Switch, Used for electric kettle, Washing machine.
sentences.chinese: 防水开关，用于电水壶，洗衣机。

sentences.english: Some clothes are not the advisability of using either washing machines wash, or it will lose.
sentences.chinese: 有些衣物则不宜用洗衣机洗涤，否则将得不偿失。

sentences.english: The laundry is fresh, the bathtubs are pristine and there’s even a treadmill and a TV with HBO.
sentences.chinese: 这里还有全新的洗衣机，浴缸，跑步机和电视机。

sentences.english: This clothes washer was meant to be used in areas where water is scarce and electricity isn’t available.
sentences.chinese: 这种滚动式的洗衣机适用于缺水少电的地区。
滚筒式双层玻璃洗衣机。

sentences.english: We provide a one-year warrantee against any prblems with our washing machines.
sentences.chinese: 我们为我们的洗衣机提供一个的保用期。

sentences.english: Use washers and dryers for full loads only.
sentences.chinese: 仅仅在干重活的时候使用洗衣机和干燥机。

sentences.english: The washing machine has gone phut.

sentences.chinese: 这台洗衣机是全自动的。

sentences.english: How did they do the laundry without washing machines?
sentences.chinese: 没有洗衣机他们怎么洗衣服？

sentences.english: The dorms are all equipped with launderettes and hot water is available 24 hours a day.
sentences.chinese: 楼内设有自助式洗衣机，24小时供应热水等。

sentences.english: My washing-machine went on the blink this morning.
The salesman demonstrated (how to use) the washing-machine.
sentences.chinese: 售货员表演了如何使用这种洗衣机。

sentences.english: I put too much detergent in the washer.
sentences.chinese: 我在洗衣机里放了太多的洗衣粉。

definition: chamber pot/wooden pan used as toilet/toilet bowl
air conditioning/air conditioner (including units that have a heating mode)/CL:臺|台[tai2]
